userProfile.title: User Profile
userProfile.description: Represents a user's profile information, including their role.

patient.title: Patient
patient.description: Represents a patient in the clinic, with encrypted medical history.

userId.description: The auth UID of the patient if they have a portal account.

clinicianId.description: The ID of the clinician assigned to this patient.

name.description: The full name of the patient.

lastVisit.description: The date of the patient's last visit.

avatarUrl.description: URL of the patient's avatar image.

scan.title: Scan
scan.description: Represents a single eye scan analysis for a patient.

patientId.description: The ID of the patient this scan belongs to.

clinicianId.description: The ID of the clinician who performed the scan.

date.description: The date the scan was performed.

imageUrl.description: URL of the eye scan image.

clinicalNotes.description: Encrypted clinical notes associated with the scan.

analysis.description: The AI analysis output. Stored as a JSON object.

report.description: The full text report generated by the AI.

message.title: Message
message.description: A single message in a chat between two users.
